name: Barney - Platformer Game with Upgradable Guns
name_original: Barney - Platformer Game with Upgradable Guns
description: The adventures of Barney is here! This is an exciting side-scrolling platform games just like Aladdin with many weapons and player upgrades, jump defense and attack. Slime Gun, Grenade Gun, Rocket Gun, Auto Rocket Gun, Rail Gun. Upgradable weapons.
